BR_text.BRdescription:
/kind bug
 What steps did you take and what happened:
 The backend will query for v1beta1 instead of v1alpha1 poddefaults. This results in an error since the version of poddefaults we use is v1alpha1.
 cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lluunn>@lluunn</denchmark-link>
